reviewtext: Sum Swamp Addition & Subtraction Game is great board game that besides providing lot of fun and excitement will help your preschool kids learn math.This board game can be played with two to four players, and requires from players to escape dangerous pitfalls by rolling dice and add/subtract numbers that are needed for moving across board.While playing it kids are learning math concepts and, what is most important, they don't realize they're actually learning through play.Due to that I can strongly recommend you this fun to play education board game for whole family.
summary: Provides lot of fun and excitement while in same time helps preschool kids learning math...
